requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 双核心 2.4GHz以上
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 8600GT 以上
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2.5 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: No dedicated graphics card required

Minimum:

  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP Service pack 3 or any newer Windows OS
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB RAM on Desktop, 1GB on certain Laptops. Integrated videocards not fully supported.
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Widescreen capable monitor (1080p) required. The game produces unreliable performance on Laptops due to integrated video chips, a home computer is recommended.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB RAM desktop.
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Widescreen capable monitor (1080p) required.
